Class DiskSearcher

java.lang.Object
  DiskSearcher

public class DiskSearcher
extends java.lang.Object

Main application class. This application searches for all files under some given path that contain a given textual pattern. All files found are copied to some specific directory.

          Capacity of the queue that holds the directories to be searched
